TopicTitle: Flight perspective goes black, then space center is skybox

Articles.Content:
Hi

I just started KSP and expireince this strage error.

When i launch a vessel then i can see it for a bit of time, but then KJR loads then the screen turns black. But i can see all the hud but not the ship and launchpad etc.

KJR is not the cause as it worked perfectly till now it is just the time when the scripts load i guess.

In the log i also do not get imidiate erros about the flight scene, just this:

> 
> [LOG 14:43:24.588] Look rotation viewing vector is zero.

Could this cause this ? 

Also when i the go back to the Space center, then the orbit skybox loads and i se the sky and the hud.

Log is here: [http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=05263130485845876732](http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=05263130485845876732)

Here are two pics: [https://imgur.com/QLfr4uR](https://imgur.com/QLfr4uR) [https://imgur.com/AhF0B9j](https://imgur.com/AhF0B9j)

This also happens on a new game!

Thanks for giving me a clue, i got no idea.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T13:22:46Z" title="05/11/2015 01:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**

That sounds like the hell kraken bug or something similar. In my exerience, that type of thing is often caused by incompatible, conflicting and/or broken plugins. It can also happen when you have a lot of kerbals on EVA close together. Do you have any pre-1.0 or experimental versions of mods, any mods which are likely to conflict, or a gathering of kerbals near KSC?

Hi

Afer some researching yes it is definitly the hell kraken!

It could be the plugins, but i removed all the ones i added before the last start. It happens with all parts, drone cores, labs etc...

No Kerbals involed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T21:17:59Z" title="05/11/2015 09:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**

This happens to me sometime, it normally happens after I switch to a ship that's been in space for a long time with Kerbal Alarm Clock but it has happened a couple of times in a 100% stock game too. I have no idea what triggers it.

Hi

For now i found the culprit, it is Firespitter (version for 1.02) (full version not just the plugin) for me for now. Hope this does not reappear.

Thanks
